title: Need these 3 T206 Brooklyn Superbas to finish my set
author: TNP777

posts.post_title: Need these 3 T206 Brooklyn Superbas to finish my set
posts.post_content:
Burch batting
Dahlen
Lumley

I'm not picky on condition, in fact the more rugged the better.  Thanks!

edit: I guess I should clarify - I am somewhat picky about condition. The vast majority of my Superba collection is P-F and all are unslabbed. I'm looking for like condition cards. Thanks very much to those who have already PMed me. I appreciate the time taken to reach out to a new guy. I'm active over on CU and have been a member of OBC since '96 but have only lurked here from time to time.

I don't know if you were set on buying from the BST boards here, but there are a couple of very affordable Burch batting cards on ebay for around $30 +/-.  I was going to pick one of those up for my collection, but I got one in an ebay auction for $28 just the other day.  

Good luck on your subset!
Down to just one: Dahlen.  Looking for a low grade example.  Anyone?
